root: ^And once again you’re listening to the program ‘Young Radio Technician’. We’re on the air every morning and evening, every day.
^We’ve been told that the number of our listeners has increased, so we decided to relaunch our lecture course on radio.
^Right now we’ll tell you that on a radio receiver you can turn the tuning knob. This lets you change the frequency.
^Well, I hope our listeners really didn’t know that, ha-ha. Keep in mind that by changing the frequency on your receiver, you can tune in to other radio stations. Don’t be afraid to experiment.
^In the evening we’ll be back with more interesting tips.
